SwitchBehaviour.description: How the switch behaves when pressed and unpressed.

EventToTrigger.description: LUA event to fire when the switch is turned on. Game appears to crash if this is left blank.

EventToTriggerOff.description: LUA event to fire when the switch is turned off.

ActiveTime.description: How long the switch will stay active for when SwitchBehaviour is set to 3.

TargetObject.description: What object this switch should activate.

Extra.name: Switches that affect things in the world.
